title: Docs - Hybrid and multicloud resources
abstract:
# Docs - Hybrid and multicloud resources
Last reviewed 2024-02-02 UTC
The Architecture Center provides content resources across a wide variety of hybrid and multicloud subjects.
content:
## Get started
If you are new to Google Cloud or new to designing hybrid and multicloud architectures that include Google Cloud, begin by reading [Hybrid and multicloud overview](/architecture/hybrid-multicloud-patterns) .
## Hybrid and multicloud resources in the Architecture Center
You can filter the following list of hybrid and multicloud resources by typing a product name or a phrase that's in the resource title or description.
